Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Very tasty pizza and great portion! We will definitely order again :)

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: I ordered some desserts here and what I got was horrible. The pastiera was dry and the tiramisu was unforgiving. Definitely the worst I have tasted in my life; the biscuit was soggy, the creme was watery, store-bought whipped cream and it ‚Ä¶

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Really nice Italian place, the food tasted good and service was pleasant. Came for lunch but it just opened so we were the only ones dining but nonetheless the atmosphere was still quite nice. I really do recommend the bruschetta as well, ‚Ä¶

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Had delivery pizza and it was... not great. Overcooked. The crust had no stretch to it: it was lifeless and dry. There are way better pizzerias at the same price point in the area: Mangia and Sotto.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Best Italian place in Amsterdam ! Fantastic south Italy style Pizza , and everything else is also just fantastic . The salads, eggplant, ect . Highly recommended !

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text:
Soo good, order here so many times, the pizzas and calzone are delicious!!
Veramente pizze buonissime!!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Dough/crust is very good and delivered very fast. However the tomatosauce could use a lot more flavor and the pizza was very greasy, oily and had little taste. I'll try again soon since reviews are good and the crust was great and this might have been a one time thing.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Authentic Italian pizza in an informal and warm place. Totally recommended.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Ordered a delivery and was very very disappointed. The only good thing was the arrival time, the issue was that even tho everything arrived in less then 30 minutes all the food was completely cold. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Haven't try many pizza places in Amsterdam but, I have to stay that "La Polpetta" delivers some decent Italian pizzas. üòÑ The combination of styles are well thought out, giving a delightful taste. üëåüèª

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: ordered 4 pizzas and got 2 cold ones. not recommended

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Super nice Parmigiana di melanzane and meatballs. The meatballs portion is huge! Good packaging for delivery also keeps it warm

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text:
Very delicious pizza's and very kind and friendly people.
Me and my Italian boyfriend are quite picky about pizza's, but these ones are perfetto!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: La Polpetta is my go to solution for a lazy dinner night. Pasta is amazing and the burrata is so so soft. But the best is the pizza, we usually have to order an extra one to munch on later. Homemade food with heart and love

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Can recommend, very nice food.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Avoid at all costs. We were walking by and saw the owner pushing a delivery guy on the floor and slamming him. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Food was OK but the service was appalling - it took almost an hour for a few pizzas despite the lady saying it would take maximum 15 minutes. A lot of deliveroo drivers came in, which was a bit distracting, but I actually ended up feeling really bad for them all having to deal with the terribly rude owners.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text:
Rude staff and unprofessional customer service

Edit: I was threatened to get "kicked/beaten up" for this review in person, ‚Ä¶

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Only place in town where you can find a real Italian pizza. Delicious!!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: French, lived in Italia between Milano and Palermo and I've to say this is my favorite place in Amsterdam. Everything is fresh, pizze seem like coming straight from Italia, lasagna definitely worth a try... Long story short, this is the place. Grazie ragazzi !

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: The best place where to get the real italian food prepared by one of the best italian chef in the world

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: We went here today with three small kids (7, 4 and 2) after travelling for a full day from Canada. The service was amazing. The food was fantastic - overall everything was perfect!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Worst pizza I've ever had served by Italians. Feels more like a laundry business than a good establishment. Move on!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Good pizza, friendly staff, fair price!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Tasty food made with authentic ingredients, fair price ratio, and very kind service. Recommended!

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Nutella dessert was quite dry. And in my opinion it should be clearer if a pizza has no tomato sauce.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Typical Italian food. Everything very good and great prices. Very friendly people. Clean room and quick and accurate service

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Nice pizza,fresh  and delicious ingredients.Bravi!!!

Review Text: The pizza was good, but they are too overwhelmed by a never-ending stream of delivery drivers to pay much attention to the diners in the restaurant.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Food served fresh but had to wait 40 to 60 minutes. Not recommended. They had bad talk from delivery riders because of time management.

Name: La Polpetta
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere. Very friendly staff. Best Italian pizza.
